giuliaComment.en: The Andrean family knows everyone. Ask them for restaurant advice--they'll tell you where to go and where to avoid. Their recommendations have never steered me wrong. The breakfast is simple but includes local products they source themselves.
giuliaComment.de: Die Familie Andrean kennt jeden. Fragen Sie sie nach Restaurantempfehlungen--sie sagen Ihnen, wohin Sie gehen und was Sie meiden sollten. Ihre Empfehlungen haben mich nie in die Irre gefuehrt. Das Fruehstueck ist einfach, enthaelt aber lokale Produkte, die sie selbst beziehen.
giuliaComment.fr: La famille Andrean connait tout le monde. Demandez-leur des conseils de restaurants--ils vous diront ou aller et quoi eviter. Leurs recommandations ne m'ont jamais trompe. Le petit-dejeuner est simple mais comprend des produits locaux qu'ils se procurent eux-memes.
giuliaComment.it: La famiglia Andrean conosce tutti. Chiedete loro consigli sui ristoranti--vi diranno dove andare e cosa evitare. Le loro raccomandazioni non mi hanno mai deluso. La colazione e semplice ma include prodotti locali che procurano loro stessi.

items.name: Hotel Marina Piccola
items.description: Recently refurbished small hotel with a contemporary feel and modern amenities. Has 12 rooms (7 doubles, 4 triples and a Junior Suite) that are quiet and recently renovated. The star feature is its view across to Manarola's marina, with exposed stone, stylish furnishings, and modern comforts. Includes excellent Ligurian seafood restaurant and prime spot for beach and coastal path. Easy to reach from train station (5 minutes walk).

giuliaComment.en: The location is perfect if harbor life is your priority. You'll hear boats in the morning and restaurants at night--this is immersion, not retreat. The fisherman who built this house would recognize the bones, even if the rooms have WiFi now.
giuliaComment.de: Die Lage ist perfekt, wenn das Hafenleben Ihre Prioritaet ist. Sie hoeren morgens Boote und abends Restaurants--das ist Eintauchen, nicht Rueckzug. Der Fischer, der dieses Haus baute, wuerde die Grundstruktur wiedererkennen, auch wenn die Zimmer jetzt WLAN haben.
giuliaComment.fr: L'emplacement est parfait si la vie du port est votre priorite. Vous entendrez les bateaux le matin et les restaurants le soir--c'est de l'immersion, pas une retraite. Le pecheur qui a construit cette maison reconnaitrait la structure, meme si les chambres ont le WiFi maintenant.
giuliaComment.it: La posizione e perfetta se la vita del porto e la vostra priorita. Sentirete le barche al mattino e i ristoranti la sera--questa e immersione, non ritiro. Il pescatore che ha costruito questa casa riconoscerebbe la struttura, anche se le camere ora hanno il WiFi.

signature.it: Dove la storia incontra il porto

intro.en: A converted fisherman's cottage with 6 rooms, rated 9.6, just a 2-minute walk from Manarola's rocky beaches.

intro.fr: Un ancien cottage de pecheur converti avec 6 chambres, note 9,6, a seulement 2 minutes a pied des plages rocheuses de Manarola.

practicalInfo.en: Best for harbor access. Upper floor for views. Can be noisy in peak season. Pet-friendly. Typically EUR135 cheaper than Manarola average.

practicalInfo.fr: Ideal pour l'acces au port. Etage superieur pour les vues. Peut etre bruyant en haute saison. Accepte les animaux. Typiquement 135 EUR moins cher que la moyenne de Manarola.
practicalInfo.it: Ideale per l'accesso al porto. Piano superiore per le viste. Puo essere rumoroso in alta stagione. Animali ammessi. Tipicamente 135 EUR piu economico della media di Manarola.
